# TFF Awards 2024

| award2_type = The Best Coach

| previous = 2023
| main = TFF Awards
| next = 2025
| awarded_for = Outstanding achievements in the Football
| previous_awards = TFF Awards 2023
| previous_date = 12 June 2023
}}
The 2024 Tanzania Football Federation Awards were held at The Super Dome in Masaki, Dar es Salaam on August 1.
These awards are given to the best performers in the Premier League, Championship, Women's Premier League, First League and CRDB Bank Federation Cup for the 2024 season.
Winner's and Nominees Men's
Premier League
